|brand = D-Link |model = DFE-530TX |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = + |revision = C1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/04/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DFE-530TX%2B_rev_C1_(??) |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|chip1 = D-Link;DL10038; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 100MbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = |eth_standard = <!-- IEEE 802.3/3u/3ab --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames -->
|is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = Has Boot ROM socket |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2000 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 790069220333 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00004SYNX |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|powledcolor = none |connactled = green (separate) |spdledcolor = none |leddupcolor = none |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device has the '''''old'' D-Link''' box style (black background, red notes, white text). :"DFE-530TX+" and "Rev.C1" is silkscreened on the card pictured on the box. ::The combo MAC/PHY is marked "DL10038", "9C050T1" (??), "949F TAIWAN". :"Lifetime Warranty and Free Support" is featured prominently on the front of the box. :The box contents listed on the back are... :*1 - 10/100 PCI NIC :*1 - Wake-On-LAN Cable (Optional) :*Driver Disk for Windows 3.11/95/2000/NT3.51/NT4/DOS Packet Driver, Netware, NDIS, ODI, Linux, and more! :The copyright year on the box is 2000.
'''[[D-Link]]''''s drivers seem to indicate the card is using a '''[[VIA]]''' chipset.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
